title_sort: walt whitman to the editor of the north american review, 12 may 1882
title: Walt Whitman to the Editor of The North American Review, 12 May 1882

person.name: Editor of The North American Review

recipient.name: Editor of The North American Review

people: Editor of The North American Review
text: 431 Stevens StreetCamden New JerseyEvn'g May 12 '82Dear SirYours of yesterday rec'dreceived—I could send the MS of Carlyle from an American Point of View by the 20th or 21st a week from now—It would make about nine or ten pages——What I said about its being "a candidate for the place of leading paper" &c—was meant to be left entirely to the editorial exigencies & judgment—no condition at all—Walt Whitman Walt Whitman to the Editor of The North American Review, 12 May 1882
